content:
Hi all,
Last week the Dataverse Sustainability Working Group published its final report with 10 recommendations on how to move forward to better the sustainability of Dataverse and its community.
The report can be found at:Â https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.13981771Â (it includes a short executive summary for those who donâ€™t have time to read the entire thing).
Many thanks to the working group members for the productive years!

Kind regards,
Dieuwertje and Dimitri
Great report overall. I let #containers know about this part: #containers > fund production-ready containers :grinning: :money:
